about_the_game:
The world has become a desolate wasteland, where boundaries between reality and nightmare have blurred, and madness is all there is to experience.
Amon Morgan, a nefarious beast who enjoys the thrill of the hunt, is back. Always lurking in the shadows, be ready to be in a constant state of dread...

Every encounter you will experience with Amon is a nerve-wracking test of your wit and composure as you find your way out of his game. His infinite bloodlust and madness are what drives him to never give up on a target, now it's your turn to fight back.



In this malevolent experience, you will go around different parts of the map, such as Institute Rockways LTC, Solstheim Town, Hector Doppler's Bunker, forests, and caves, each part creepier than the last, and you will have to fight back against new secret antagonists in some of these, so remember... always check around your corners.



Features:

  • Great variability of levels
  • Dreadful stages
  • Terrifying original soundtrack
  • Multiple challenges
  • Gripping lore with eerie enigmas
  • Different enemies, each with its voice lines and deranged personalities
